channel.title: Random npc drops (iclarity)
channel.description: hey all ive looked for about an hour now and was wonder if some one could explain how to make my npcs drop random items with % chance of getting like in devo or if some one could point me to the right tut...

item.title: Random npc drops (iclarity)
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

[quote=“Yorchi elite, post:2, topic:300982”]Im not sure you can add ramdom npc drop on 317 servers, but you need to add in npcdrops.cfg like:

npcdrop = 1 995 100 100

id - item - amout - change[/quote]

lol thats soo wrong “change” is wrong its phail worng GJ on rest but its not “change” its droprate

Read full topic
